subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: All games involving the Rockies these days conclude the same way, and their 3-2 victory in 11 innings gave them a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series that shifts to Denver for Game 3 on Sunday.
snippet: All games involving the Rockies these days conclude the same way, and their 3-2 victory in 11 innings gave them a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series that shifts to Denver for Game 3 on Sunday.
